title: What are the things you can never live without? - Quora

response.answer_text: Apparently, my dignity. When I was a teenager in the third-world country, I once had a really bad intestinal infection from eating some grapes. So bad, I was admitted for a hospital stay. Unfortunately, so was everyone else it seemed. The hospital was not in the best of shapes before the epidemic. But now it was a certifiable hell. The bathroom looked so bad, I still remember it, decades later. It was like a violent surgical room painted with diarrhea shit and blood. There was no toilet paper or water either. Because of the condition of the bathrooms and weakness, everyone were using the bedpans right in the hospital rooms. Each housed about 10–15 people. The personnel was a little bit… strained. They also didn’t have a dining area so everyone were eating in the same room. In any event, I refused to eat anything in that room or even use a bathroom and spent 12 hours straight sitting on a windowsill. Then I realized that I’m just going to die that way but still couldn’t make myself to get off. Finally, I walked to the nurses’ room and asked to make a phone call. I called my dad and told him: “I want to go home.” He asked: “Why?” I was surrounded by medical personnel, so I just said: “I… cannot tell you. Just come and get me.” Of course, my parents came right over and got me, despite the objections of the staff.

1.) Communication- The reason I say communication because if you’re segregated, and isolated it will drive you nuts or make you go nuts if you don’t have any kind of communication with people. 2.) Affection/ Attention- Affection.. let’s people know that you care about them, and so affection is a “ need” to want, and be loved in return. It’s important to have that because if you don’t.. then you’ll be angry, and pissed off the world, and hating everyone in it. Attention- People that are neglected, and aren’t getting attention can sometimes.. whine, and lash out and cause problems due to lack of attention, and annoy people. It’s important to be a part of a person’s life, and give them attention. Giving a person attention shows you care, and it goes with affection. 3.) Food- You need energy, and food to survive. Without food.. you’ll be sick, and tired and.. other health issues. 4.) Shelter- Shelter is important.. because you need a place to rest, and cook and sleep in, and entertain yourself. 5.) Clothes- You can’t walk out side Nude, and you need clothes to go places, and to secure yourself from cold or from heat. That’s why they have winter clothes, and summer clothes, and other things. Not only that.. clothes ware off, and so you need fresh garments like Underwear, and bra’s, and socks and caps on your head. They say the most sensitive spot on your body is the top of your head, and your feet. That’s why so many people get colds, and sick easily.. when it comes the flu season. People don’t wear socks on it’s feet, and keep itself warm. I believe clothes is something people could not live without. Those are 5 things/ people you could not live without.
